mapper.select: select s.id ,title ,content ,start_date ,end_date ,price ,show_status ,show_img ,show_type_id1 ,hall_tb_id ,name from show_tb s join hall_tb h on s.hall_tb_id = h.id where s.id=#{id}
select * from show_tb where not show_status like '승인%' and not show_status like '결제%' and not show_status like '취소%' and not show_status like '환불%' order by end_date limit #{offset}, #{recordSize}

select * from show_tb where #{date} >= start_date and end_date >= #{date} and not show_status like '승인%' and not show_status like '결제%' and not show_status like '취소%' and not show_status like '환불%' order by end_date limit #{offset}, #{recordSize}
select start_date, end_date, name from show_tb s join hall_tb h on s.hall_tb_id = h.id join hall_type ht on h.hall_type_id = ht.id where name=#{name}
select id from hall_tb where name=#{name}
